## Supplementary (own-time)

🔕 You do not have to complete these but if you wish you can.

Please remember that in order to master to fullness on data visualization in R, you might want to learn `ggplot2` package. Since `ggplot2` is extremely useful, I will stroungly encourage you to take ETX2250/ETF5922.

I have created the learning material for Clayton student years ago and if you are just interested to know how it works. The following link might help.
